snippet: Glen Taylor, owner of the Minnesota Timberwolves basketball team, has signed a letter of intent to buy The Minneapolis Star Tribune, the newspaper announced on Tuesday.
abstract: Glen Taylor, billionaire owner of Minnesota Timberwolves basketball team, signs letter of intent to buy The Minneapolis Star Tribune.
lead_paragraph: Glen Taylor, owner of the Minnesota Timberwolves basketball team, has signed a letter of intent to buy The Minneapolis Star Tribune, the newspaper announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: Billionaire Sports Owner Plans to Buy Minneapolis Newspaper
headline.print_headline: Billionaire Sports Owner Plans to Buy Minneapolis Newspaper
